Title: How China’s ‘Crystal Capital’ Cornered the Market on a Western Obsession
Description:
Decades ago, Donghai was a backwater county.
Today, thanks to an army of 24/7 livestreamers, it orchestrates a multibillion-dollar global industry.

Title: 23 Ways You’re Already Living in the Chinese Century
Description:
The robotics explosion.
The energy revolution.
The cultural takeover.
It’s everything you wanted for the United States—but done better in China.

Title: Chinese EV Batteries Are Eating the World
Description: China’s lithium batteries aren’t always “made in China.” Companies like BYD and CATL are building factories on nearly every continent.

Title: Chris Pratt on new film Mercy: I asked to be locked into an executioner's chair
Description: The Marvel star plays a detective with 90 minutes to prove to an AI judge he did not murder his wife.

Title: Confronted over Greenland, Europe is ditching its softly-softly approach to Trump
Description:
Transatlantic relations aren't broken, though they are damaged.
And if Europeans want to try to cut through with Trump, they'll have to stick together, writes Europe Editor Katya Adler

Title: I used RayNeo's X3 Pro for a month — these AR glasses are futuristic, but there's a big problem
Description:
With the X3 Pro, RayNeo has one of the best AR glasses you can buy today.
But should you do so? Not yet.
The middling battery life makes these glasses unusable.

Title: Trump promised to cut energy bills in half. One year later, has he delivered?
Description:
Cheap gasoline, yes.
Drill, baby, drill? Not so much.
And electricity bills are going up, not down.

Title: Elon Musk said automakers don't want to license Tesla FSD. We're starting to see why.
Description: Legacy automakers and Tesla rival Rivian have recently announced roadmaps to pursue autonomous driving technology in-house.

Title: Italian fashion designer Valentino dies at 93. His legacy was his devotion to dressing women — many adored him.
Description: "I loved how he always pestered me to 'at least wear a little mascara' when I came to dinner," Gwyneth Paltrow paid tribute to Valentino on Instagram.

Title: Where tech leaders now choose to meet

For a long time, tech events were built around scale.
